Summary: Saw a flashing long bar of light hovering over Lodi.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 10:00 PM I looked out my west window and saw an orange bar of light hovering seemingly over the town of Lodi, Ca. Approx. every second there would be a white flash from near the middle of the object. Object was fairly large - about an inch long from where I was. After maybe 5 minutes another of the same objects, color, size and actions the same, appeared off to the side a bit, but lower down than the first one. This second object was only visible for 10-15 seconds and vanished. I continued watching for over an hour, then it seemed to get smaller as if it were moving off to the west, so I quit watching I knew this was not a plane for it did not move, and even a helicopter would not remain stationary that long. Also if it were a star or satellite it would have moved.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Lodi
There were no other sightings in Lodi on or around July 30th 2010
